Item.Name: ABC Commissary
Item.Content:
ABC Commissary in Commissary Lane, Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for ABC Commissary

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001220.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Feast on fare with international flair—Asian salad with chicken, burgers, sandwiches, desserts and more—amid an Art Deco setting that features film posters from past and present, all while movie trailers play on TVs. Beer and wine are also available.

While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Oasis Canteen in Echo Lake, Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Oasis Canteen

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/15494775.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
This Indiana Jones-style desert canteen may look ramshackle and rusty… but it’s a trusted tabernacle for travelers hankering for beverages and signature sweet treats—including funnel cakes, topped off with an assortment of tempting accoutrement.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Item.Name: Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant
Item.Content:
Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant in Commissary Lane, Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002114.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Do dinner and a movie retro-style at this eatery done up like a ’50s drive-in, with all-American cuisine to match.
WDWNT says...
I think this restaurant is highly underrated. It isn't anything spectacular, but the food is very consistently good. Get a simple hamburger and some onion rings and enjoy one of the best atmospheres in any Disney restaurant.
  Book Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant Dining Reservations
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

The Hollywood Brown Derby Lounge in Hollywood Boulevard , Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/17571157.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Slip inside this star-studded tuck-away to take in the many sights and sounds—and tastes—of Hollywood. Relax as you indulge in a few of the finer things, including appetizers, wine and libations like signature Derby cocktails and martinis.
